name: Mayhem On Xmas
description:
Art: 

Nick Perolita

Stupid Zack

Oriana A. Clarembaux

Code:

Daniel Rivero (Gappy)

Omar El Fakih (Kegnor)

Audio: 

Music by Waves and Blaze

Sound Effects from AR Sound Effects, Matias HD and HQSF

Controls:

-Move with the WASD or Arrow keys. 

-Point with the mouse, press left click to shoot and Space key to reload.
